welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kashima, Japan! Embrace the city's rich history, stunning shrines, and beautiful nature as you explore all that this charming destination has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time here.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights, with a wide range of amenities and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for international and domestic flights, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal for low-cost carriers, with basic facilities and limited dining options.

wifi.note: Unlimited free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
